author: Julie Compton
title: Can 'windowed work' help ease the stress of working from home?
description: Software company Range encourages the concept of "windowed work" to help employees juggle the pressures of working from home in this strange new normal.
content: Many Americans with non-essential jobs have been ordered to work from home due to the COVID-19 pandemic. At the same time, schools and daycare centers are shuttering across the U.S.. Meanwhile, employers are struggling to transition their workforces online, w… [+6908 chars]
